Everything that you've dreamed of
Write what I'm telling you dad,
Dad
 I tried to eat the whole world
Coming from beneath the mud
Trying to die as a legend
Don't forget where your fire comes from
 They say that the present is a gift
And I already was missing myself
So we unrapped the blindfold
We're still so far from the end
(Today is the day)
 Where you at
Where you been
There's longing
For a new anthem
 Where have you been
I'm on my own
They want news
They're calling me
 Where you at
Where you been
There's longing
For a new anthem
 Where have you been
I'm on my own
They want news
They're calling me

original_poem:
Olha para a frente, se não cais
foge desta terra de animais
a escuridão é escrava da nossa vontade de sofrer
 Está na hora, nada importa, só agora
está na hora, tudo importa, se for agora
abre as asas borboleta, e voa
 Se não podes contra o vento
deixa a corrente levar
o que levas aí dentro
preso no teu agarrar
 Acorda, já dormiste tempo demais
será que não viste os sinais?
O Universo fala, mas só para quem o quer ouvir
 Está na hora, nada importa, só agora
está na hora, tudo importa, se for agora
 Se não podes contra o vento
deixa a corrente levar
o que levas aí dentro
preso no teu agarrar
 Se não podes contra o vento
deixa a corrente levar
o que levas aí dentro
preso no teu agarrar
 Bate as asas borboleta
amanhã és furacão
bate as asas borboleta
antes da tua extinção
…
translated_poem:
Look ahead, or else you'll fall
flee from this land of animals
the darkness is slave to our will to suffer
 It's time, nothing matters, only now
it's time, everything matters, if it is now
spread your wings butterfly, and fly
 If you can't against the wind
let the current carry away
what you carry inside
held within your grasp
 Wake up, you have slept for too long
have you not seen the signs?
The Universe speaks, but only to those who want to listen
 It's time, nothing matters, only now
it's time, everything matters, if it is now
 If you can't against the wind
let the current carry away
what you carry inside
held within your grasp
 If you can't against the wind
let the current carry away
what you carry inside
held within your grasp
 Flap your wings butterfly
tomorrow you're a hurricane
flap your wings butterfly
before your extinction
...

original_poem:
Ninguém na rua na noite fria,
Só eu e o luar;
Voltava a casa quando vi que havia
Luz num velho bar.
Não hesitei,
Fazia frio e nele entrei.
 Estando tão longe da minha terra
Tive a sensação,
De ter entrado numa taberna
De Braga ou Monção;
E um homem velho se acercou
E assim falou :
 (REF)
Vamos brindar com vinho verde
Que é do meu Portugal
E o vinho verde me fará recordar
A aldeia branca que deixei atrás do mar.
Vamos brindar com verde vinho
P'ra que possa cantar, canções do Minho
Que me fazem sonhar,
Com o momento de voltar ao lar.
 Falou-me então daquele dia triste,
O velho Luís;
Em que deixara tudo quanto existe,
P'ra fazer feliz;
A noiva, a mãe, a casa, o pai
E o cão também.
 Pensando agora naquela cena
Que na estranja vi;
Recordo a mágoa, recordo a pena,
Que com ele vivi;
Bom português
Regressa breve e vem de vez !
 (REF)
Vamos brindar com vinho verde
Que é do meu Portugal
E o vinho verde me fará recordar
A aldeia branca que deixei atrás do mar.
Vamos brindar com verde vinho
P'ra que possa cantar, canções do Minho
Que me fazem sonhar,
Com o momento de voltar ao lar.
translated_poem:
No one on the streets in the cold night
just me and the moonlight
coming back to my house I saw there was
light in an old bar
I didn't hesitate
it was cold and I went in
 Being so far way from my land
I had the sensation
of having entered a tavern
of Braga or Monção
and an old man approached
and like this he spoke:
 "Let's make a toast, with the green wine
that's from my Portugal
and the green wine shall make me recall
the white village that I left, beyond the sea"
"Let's make a toast, with the green wine
so that I may sing, songs from the Minho
that make me dream
about the moment of going... back home"
 And so he told me of that sad day
old man Luís
when he had left everything there was
to find happiness
his bride, his mother, his house, his father
and the dog too
 Thinking back now about that scene
that abroad I saw
I recall the grief, I recall the pain
that I lived with him
a good Portuguese
comes back soon, and comes for good!
 "Let's make a toast, with the green wine
that's from my Portugal
and the green wine shall make me recall
the white village that I left, beyond the sea"
"Let's make a toast, with the green wine
so that I may sing, songs from the Minho
that make me dream
about the moment of going... back home"
…

original_poem:
Lavam-se os olhos, nega-se o beijo
Do labirinto escolhe-se o mar
No cais deserto fica o desejo
Da terra quente por conquistar
 Nobre soldado que vens senhor
Por sobre as asas do teu dragão
Beijas os corpos no chão queimado
Nunca terás o nosso perdão
 Ai Timor
Calam-se as vozes
Dos teus avós
Ai Timor
Se outros calam
Cantemos nós
 Salgas de ventres que não tiveste
Ceifando os filhos que não são teus
Nobre soldado nunca sonhaste
Ver uma espada na mão de Deus
 Da cruz se faz uma lança em chamas
Que sangra o céu no sol do meio dia
Do meio dos corpos a mesma lama
Leito final onde o amor nascia
translated_poem:
The eyes are washed, the kiss is denied
out of this labyrinth, we choose the sea
in the deserted haven, stays the desire
for the warm land, to be conquered
 Noble soldier who comes, sir
over the wings of your dragon
you kiss the bodies on the burned ground
you shall never be our forgiveness
 Oh Timor
silent are the voices, of your forefathers
Oh Timor
if others are silent, let us sing ourselves
 You salt the wombs you did not have
reaping the sons that are not yours
noble soldier, you've never dreamed of
seeing a sword in the hand of God
 Out of the Cross is made a spear in flames
that bleeds the heavens under the midday sun
amidst the bodies, the same mud
final resting place where love was born
 Oh Timor
silent are the voices, of your forefathers
Oh Timor
if others are silent, let us sing ourselves
...

original_poem:
Fui ao mar e não vi nada:
Nem sequer vi onde estava!
 Só ouvia a solidão
Da cantiga que eu cantava
E senti-me só no escuro...
Aaah... Aaah...
 Onde está a alegria
Que eu sonhava alcançar?
 E lembrei porque partira:
Era o mar e a minha Lira
E senti-me só no escuro...
Aaah... Aaah...
 Onde está a alegria
Que eu sonhava alcançar?
 Foi esquecida por amor
Que é tão grande, que é melhor!
Aaah... Aaah...
Aaah... Aaah...
 Onde está a alegria
Que eu sonhava alcançar?
 Foi esquecida por amor
Que é tão grande, que é melhor!
translated_poem:
I went to the sea and didn't see anything:
I didn't even see where I was!
 I could only hear the loneliness
Of the folk tune I was singing
And I felt so alone, in the dark...
Aaah... Aaah...
 Where is the joy
That I dreamed to attain?
 And I remembered why it left:
It was the sea and my Lyre
And I felt so alone, in the dark...
Aaah... Aaah...
 Where is the joy
That I dreamed to attain?
 It was forgotten out of love
Which is so great, which is much better!
Aaah... Aaah...
Aaah... Aaah...
 Where is the joy
That I dreamed to attain?
 It was forgotten out of love
Which is so great, which is much better!

original_poem:
Ribeiro não corras mais
Que não hás-de ser eterno
O verão vai-te roubar
O que te deu o inverno
 Até a lenha no monte
Tem sua separação
Duma lenha se faz Santos e
E d’outra lenha se faz carvão
 Ando caído em desgraça
O que é que eu hei-de fazer
Todos os santos que pinte
Demónios têm que ser
 São tão grandes minhas penas
Que me deitam a afogar
Vêm umas atrás das outras
Tal como as ondas do mar
 Apanho e como as raízes
Que estão debaixo da terra
Só as ramas não as como
Porque essas o vento as leva
 Ó pinheiro meu irmão,
Tu também és como eu
Também tu estendes em vão
Ó pinheiro irmão,
Teus braços p’ro céu
translated_poem:
Stream, do stop running
For you shan't be eternal:
The Summer will steal from you
What Winter gave you.
 Even the wood up in the mountains
Must face separation:
Some wood is for carving effigies of saints
And other wood is to be turned into coal.
 I'm afflicted by misfortune;
What is it that I should do?
All the saints I've painted
Must turn into demons!
 My sorrows are so great
That they're suffocating me;
They come one after the other,
Just like the waves out at sea.
 I grab and feed on the roots
That spread beneath the ground;
I just don't eat the branches,
For they're dragged away by the wind.
 Oh pine tree, brother of mine!
You are like me, as well:
You also raise in vain,
Oh pine tree, my dear brother!
Your arms up to heaven...

I keep imaging things we both can do
You on top of me and twerking, one more night of pleasure
We both live close, even sharing the same area code
So come on over here twink, 'cause it will happen naturally
 Put your hands on the wall
I will make you strong
Ask with malice
Take pocpoc1

Non stop

This is pocpoc rhythm

"Toma pocpoc" imply a rhythmic and physical interaction, emphasizing the intensity and passion of the moment. Overall, the lyrics evoke a sense of seduction and intimacy, describing the narrator's fantasies and eagerness for a physical connection with their partner.

original_poem:

E por causa dessa blusa eu perdi minha amada

Mas se quiser vá, mas se quiser vá
Você vai tomando conta da vida que tu queria viver
Da vida que tu queria viver
 A mulher que eu mais amava deu a blusa a outro
Deu a blusa a outro e me abandonou
Porque tanto que fiz por você
Nada disso agradecia
Meu Deus, o que vou fazer pra me casar com Maria
 A mulher que eu mais amava deu a blusa a outro

Porque tanto que fiz por você
Nada disso agradecia

Se quer meu beijinho, a você não vou negar

Eu canto pra você agora, na hora

translated_poem:
What a pretty shirt I bought for her
and because of that shirt I lost my beloved
because of that shirt I lost my love
But if you want, leave: but if you want, leave
You're taking a hold of the life you wanted to live
Of the life you wanted to live
 The woman I loved the most gave the shirt to another man
Gave the shirt to someone else and left me
because all that I did for you
you didn't appreciate
My God, I'm going to marry Maria now
 The woman I loved the most gave the shirt to another man
Gave the shirt to someone else and left me
because all that I did for you
you didn't appreciate
My God, I'm going to marry Maria now
 If you want love, I'll give it to you
If you want affection, I'll give that to you too
If you want my kiss, I'm not going to deprive you
Whatever you want from me, dear
I'm singing for you now, right now
 What a pretty shirt I bought for her
and because of that shirt I lost my beloved
because of that shirt I lost my love
But if you want, leave: but if you want, leave
You're taking a hold of the life you wanted to live
Of the life you wanted to live

because all that I did for you
you didn't appreciate

because all that I did for you
you didn't appreciate

I'm singing for you now, right now

original_poem:
Eu ando mentindo demais
Ontem eu disse eu te amo, né?
Até o fim da minha vida, né?
 Eu menti
Se tiver outra vida eu vou te amar também
E tem mais
Quando eu chegar cansado em casa
Vou mentir que tô sem sono
Que ainda aguento uma noite inteira
Ouvindo como foi seu dia
 Eu só minto porque a mentira até certo ponto
Serve pra omitir verdades que querem escapar
Do coração que não tem freio, não tem filtro quando ama
Quer gritar pro mundo que achou quem tanto procurou
Cê tá certa, eu tô mentindo demais
 Eu ando mentindo demais

Do coração que não tem freio, não tem filtro quando ama
Quer gritar pro mundo que achou quem tanto procurou

Cê tá certa, eu tô mentindo demais
translated_poem:
I'm lying too much these days
Yesterday I told you I loved you, right?
to death, right?
 I lied
If there's another life, I'm going to love you then too
And another thing
When I come home tired
I'm going to lie and say I'm not
so I'll stay up all night
hearing how your day went
 I only lie because a lie up to a certain point
hides truths that want to come out
of a heart without brakes, that doesn't have a filter when it loves
It wants to shout to the world that it found what it was looking for so hard
You're right. I'm lying too much

to death, right?

If there's another life, I'm going to love you then too
And another thing

I'm going to lie and say I'm not
so I'll stay up all night
hearing how your day went

of a heart without brakes, that doesn't have a filter when it loves

Olha a chuva caindo lá fora
E a casa inteira só pra gente
Será que pode melhorar?
Que tal um chocolate quente?
 Olha, tá tarde pro'cê ir embora
Não é melhor você ficar?
Te empresto uma roupa minha

Lê a minha mente
Vai que de repente a gente tá pensando igual
 No sofá da sala
Energia surreal
 Aqui dentro amor
Lá fora é temporal

translated_poem:
Look, rain is coming down outside
and the entire house is ours
Could it get any better?
How about some hot chocolate?
 Look, it's too late for you to leave
Isn't it best that you stay here?
I'll lend you some of my clothes
But I know well that you're not even going to need them
 Look into my eyes
Read my mind
Come on, just maybe we're thinking the same thing
 On the couch in the living room
Surreal energy
 Inside here, love
Out there, storms

original_poem:
Nasci em 95
Chamaram-me António
Filho dos meus pais
Pai dos meus heterónimos
Um dia vou morrer
Mas não vou morrer anónimo
Eu sou o António
Eu sou o António
 O nome eu não escolhi
A Graça foi-me emprestada
Fui criado por mulheres
Mãe, irmã, avó, madrasta
Amo todas por inteiro
O meu pai idem aspas
Eu sou o António
Eu sou o António
 Sou o António
(Chama... Chama... Chama...)
Sou o António
(Chama... Chama... Chama...)
Chamo-me António
(Chama... Chama... Chama...)
Chama o António
(Chama... Chama... Chama...)
 O LEFT. não bazou
Faz parte do berçário
E se é para ser sincero
Tem-me dado um bom salário
Cresci para ser quem sou
De mim próprio sou sinónimo
Eu sou o António
Eu sou o António
 Escolhi ser artista
Maldita profissão
Entregar a minha alma
Para a vossa aprovação
 Ai, eu sou tão educado
Que por ti eu viro afónico
Eu sou o António
Eu sou o António
 Sou o António
(Chama... Chama... Chama...)
Sou o António
(Chama... Chama... Chama...)
Chamo-me António
(Chama... Chama... Chama...)
Chama o António
(Chama... Chama... Chama...)
translated_poem:
I was born in '95
I was named 'António'
Son to my parents
A father to my heteronyms
One day I will die
But I won't die anonymously
I am António
I am António
 I didn't choose my name
I borrowed Grace
I was raised by women
Mother, sister, grandma, stepmother
I love them all as a whole
Same for my father
I am António
I am António
 I am António
(Call... Call... Call...)
I am António
(Call... Call... Call...)
I am named António
(Call... Call... Call...)
Call António
(Call... Call... Call...)
 LEFT. isn't gone
He's a part of the nursery
And if I am to be honest
He's been making me some good money
I grew up to be who I am
I'm a synonym to myself
I am António
I am António
 I decided to be an artist
Damned profession
Give my soul in
For you to approve
 Oh, I am so polite
That I will lose my voice for you
I am António
I am António
 I am António
(Call... Call... Call...)
I am António
(Call... Call... Call...)
I am named António
(Call... Call... Call...)
Call António
(Call... Call... Call...)

translated_poem:
Around this bonfire
(Longing and sadness)
While our weapons are at rest
(Longing and sadness)
I let my eyes fall up to the sky
(Longing and sadness)
Over the stars in your own eyes...
 [Chorus:]
Longing and sadness
Beloved of mine,
My lady,
Crystal dove!
 Beloved of mine,
My lady,
Fire of passion!
 Around this bonfire
(Longing and sadness)

I let my eyes fall up to the sky

 My love, you're so far away...

original_poem:
[Refrão:]
Hoje vi o meu amor
Lindo, tão lindo a sorrir!
Hoje vi o meu amor
Lindo, tão lindo a brilhar!
 Saudade, sabor a dor,
Ver-te tão longe de mim!
Tão triste, este amor
Sempre tão fiel aqui;
Estou tão só, lá irá
Ver-te passar feliz!
 [Refrão:]
Hoje vi o meu amor
Lindo, tão lindo a sorrir!
Hoje vi o meu amor
Lindo, tão lindo a brilhar!
 Saudade, só tu
Sabes o que eu vou sentir.
Tristeza, também tu
Conheces o meu sofrer...
Sempre só, lá irá
Vendo-te passar feliz!
 [Refrão:]
Hoje vi o meu amor
Lindo, tão lindo a sorrir!
Hoje vi o meu amor
Lindo, tão lindo a brilhar!
translated_poem:
[Chorus:]
Today I've seen my beloved
Lovely, so lovely as he smiled!
Today I've seen my beloved
Lovely, so lovely as he shone!
 Longing, the taste of pain,
Seeing you so far away from me!
So sad, this love
Ever so faithful in here;
I'm so lonely, there it is
Watching you walk by, so happy!
 [Chorus:]
Today I've seen my beloved
Lovely, so lovely as he smiled!
Today I've seen my beloved
Lovely, so lovely as he shone!
 Longing, only you
Knows what I'm going to feel.
Sadness, you also
Know of my suffering...
Always alone, there it is
Watching you walk by, so happy!
 [Chorus:]
Today I've seen my beloved
Lovely, so lovely as he smiled!
Today I've seen my beloved
Lovely, so lovely as he shone!

original_poem:
No céu cinzento,
Sob o astro mudo,
Batendo as asas
Pela noite calada,
Vêm em bandos
Com pés de veludo,
Chupar o sangue
Fresco da manada!
 Se alguém se engana
Com seu ar sisudo
E lhes franqueia
As portas à chegada...
 [Refrão:]
Eles comem tudo...
Eles comem tudo...
Eles comem tudo
E não deixam nada!
 Eles comem tudo...
Eles comem tudo...
Eles comem tudo
E não deixam nada!
 A toda a parte
Chegam os vampiros:
Poisam nos prédios,
Poisam nas calçadas!
Trazem, no ventre,
Despojos antigos,
Mas nada os prende
Às vidas acabadas...
 São os mordomos
Do universo todo;
Senhores à força,
Mandadores sem lei!
Enchem as tulhas,
Bebem vinho novo,
Dançam a ronda
No pinhal do rei...
 [Refrão:]
Eles comem tudo...
Eles comem tudo...
Eles comem tudo
E não deixam nada!
 Eles comem tudo...
Eles comem tudo...
Eles comem tudo
E não deixam nada!
 No chão do medo
Tombam os vencidos:
Ouvem-se os gritos
Na noite abafada!
Jazem nos fossos,
Vítimas dum credo,
E não se esgota
O sangue da manada...
 Se alguém se engana
Com seu ar sisudo
E lhes franqueia
As portas à chegada...
 [Refrão:]
Eles comem tudo...
Eles comem tudo...
Eles comem tudo
E não deixam nada!
 Eles comem tudo...
Eles comem tudo...
Eles comem tudo
E não deixam nada!
translated_poem:
In the dark skies,
Under the speechless star,
Flapping their wings
Across the silent night,
They come in cauldrons 1
With velvet-like feet,
To drink the herd's
Fresh blood!
 If someone is deceived
By their judicious demeanour
And opens his doors
To them, as they arrive...
 [Chorus:]
They devour everything...
They devour everything...
They devour everything
And don't leave anything at all!
 They devour everything...
They devour everything...
They devour everything
And don't leave anything at all!
 Vampires
Reach every single place:
They stand on buildings,
They stand on footpaths!
In their bellies, they carry
Ancient spoils,
Yet nothing ties them
To their spent lives...
 They're the stewards
Of the entire universe;
Lords by force,
Lawless rulers!
They fill their granaries,
They drink young wine,
They dance in a wheel
Around the king's pine forest...
 [Chorus:]
They devour everything...
They devour everything...
They devour everything
And don't leave anything at all!
 They devour everything...
They devour everything...
They devour everything
And don't leave anything at all!
 The defeated fall
On the ground of dread:
Their cries can be heard
In the airless night!
They lie in the trenches,
Victims of a belief,
And the herd's blood
Is never depleted...
 If someone is deceived
By their judicious demeanour
And opens his doors
To them, as they arrive...
 [Chorus:]
They devour everything...
They devour everything...
They devour everything
And don't leave anything at all!
 They devour everything...
They devour everything...
They devour everything
And don't leave anything at all!
  1.
In English, a group of flying bats is known as a cauldron, whereas when they're in their lair, bats are known as a colony.

Vi-te a trabalhar o dia inteiro,

Muita força pra pouco dinheiro!

translated_poem:
I watched you work all day long
Building cities for others,
Carrying stones, wasting
So much strength for so little money!
I watched you work all day long:
So much strength for so little money!
 [Chorus:]
What power is that?
What power is that
Which you have in your arms,
Which is only useful for obeying?
Which only compels you to obey?
What power is that, my friend?
What power is that, my friend,
Which makes you benefit others
And bring harm to yourself?
What power is that, my friend?
What power is that, my friend?
What power is that, my friend...?
 Don't tell me that you can't understand me
When the days are turning so bitter!
Don't tell me that you've never felt
A force rise from your fingers
And rage explode between your teeth!
Don't tell me that you can't understand me...
 [Chorus:]
What power is that?
What power is that
Which you have in your arms,
Which is only useful for obeying?
Which only compels you to obey?
What power is that, my friend?
What power is that, my friend,
Which makes you benefit others
And bring harm to yourself?
What power is that, my friend?
What power is that, my friend?
What power is that, my friend...?
 I watched you work all day long
Building cities for others,
Carrying stones, wasting
So much strength for so little money!
I watched you work all day long:
So much strength for so little money!
 [Chorus:]

original_poem:
Mesmo longe eu não consigo lhe esquecer
No luar tão lindo posso ver você
Volte, por favor, pra me fazer feliz
Porque sempre amor, muito eu lhe quis
 E por onde eu ande, e por onde eu for
Sinto aqui tão grande meu eterno amor
E sonhando sempre em lhe abraçar
Meu caminho eu sigo a chorar
 E minha vida triste vai seguindo assim
Trazendo mil lembranças que não têm mais fim
De um amor tão lindo que se acabou
Mas não vai se apagar
 E minha vida triste vai seguindo assim
Trazendo mil lembranças que não têm mais fim
De um amor tão lindo que se acabou
Mas não vai se apagar
 E por onde eu ande, e por onde eu for
Sinto aqui tão grande meu eterno amor
E sonhando sempre em lhe abraçar
Meu caminho eu sigo a chorar
translated_poem:
Even in the distance, your memories linger
I glimpse you in the radiant moon's embrace
Come back, please, to make me happy
For, my beloved, you've always been my desire
 And wherever I wander, wherever I go to
I feel deep inside my endless eternal love
And dreaming of holding you
Along every path I tread, I remain crying
 And in this manner my sorrowful life moves on
Bringing back a thousand of timeless memories
of a love once cherished, though now extinguished
And yet refusing to fade away
 And in this manner my sorrowful life moves on
Bringing back a thousand of timeless memories
of a love once cherished, though now extinguished
And yet refusing to fade away
 And wherever I wander, wherever I go to
I feel deep inside my endless eternal love
And dreaming of holding you
Along every path I tread, I remain crying

original_poem:
Look at this stuff, isn't it neat?
Wouldn't you think my collection's complete?
Synes du ikke at nu, nu mangler jeg ingenting?
 В този простор аз имам свой
Кът със богатства и тайни безброй
אבל אני אז אומר
כן, זה מקור אושרי

아주 귀하고 별난 것도
너도 한번 볼래? Dám ti všechny.
No tak ber, co já stím, вирдумок
 ავფრინდები როგორც, პეპელა
A chcem byť s ním, keď sa vznáša v tanci
Y caminar con los... ¿Cómo se llaman? Ah, pies
 Con le mie pinne non si può far
Vorrei le gambe per saltare ed 散歩したり
どこを歩くんだっけ？ 道
 Långt ovanför, finns det ett land
Där man kan gå i sol på en strand
Der man er fri, det kunne bli
Mer enn en drøm
 ¿Qué debo dar para vivir fuera del agua?
Śnię o tym, że przytuli mnie nadmorski piach
 若有一天 能出水面
我願用 peuvent aimer sans frayeur
Femmes sirènes, femmes humaines
J'ai fait mon choix
 Je veux tout connaître, comprendre et savoir
Poser mes questions, apprendre mes leçons
Was ist Feuer und wie gerät etwas in…
Brand?
 Wann bin ich dran? Quero morar

逃离海底 我要走进

translated_poem:
Look at this stuff, isn't it neat?
Wouldn't you think my collection's complete?
Don't you think that right now I lack nothing?
 In this space I've got my own corner with countless treasures and secrets
But then I say
Yes, it's a source of happiness
 I gotta lots of interesting things
And very precious and unique, too
You wanna take a look?
 I'll give you all of them.
Come on, take what I say, whirlwind of thoughts
 I fly like a butterfly
And I wanna be with him as he floats in the dance
And walk with the...
Whatchamacallit? Ah yeah, feet
It can't be done with my fins
I wish I had legs to jump and take a walk
Where are you walking? Road
 There's a country far above
Where you can walk along a beach in the sun
Where you're free, it could be more than a dream
 What should I give to live above water?
I dream that the seaside sand will hold me
 If one day I can come out of the water
I'd like to be able
to love without fear
Mermaid women, human women
I made my choice
 I wanna know everything, understand and know
Ask my questions, learn my lessons
 What's fire and how does something get into...
Fire?
When is my turn?
I wanna live in that world full of air
Escape from the bottom of the sea,
I wanna walk in part of that world

original_poem:
Aqui é o teu lugar, o mundo dos humanos não é...
A vida aqui no mar é muito melhor do que lá em cima
 Querer o que não é nosso... não dá para ser feliz!
Não queiras ir lá pra cima, vê bem, sou eu quem o diz!
Olha o mundo em teu redor aqui no fundo do mar
Tanta coisa e tanta cor mais, que mais vais tu desejar?
 Aqui no mar, aqui no mar
É melhor cá, é pior lá posso jurar
P'ra lém do mar a vida é má
Escravatura é o que há
Nós flutuamos o tempo todo aqui no mar
 No mar todos estão contentes, a nossa vida é brincar
Na terra é bem diferente, servimos só pra fritar
Às vezes no aquário, não tem muito que saber
Se sou bom pelo contrário, é a mim que vão comer
 Ó não
Aqui no mar, aqui no mar
Não somos fritos nem nos cozinham in fricassee
Fazemos parte do seu rol, mandam-nos sempre o anzol
Eu bem vos digo, cá não há perigo
 Aqui no mar (Aqui no mar) Aqui no mar (Aqui no mar)
Da boa vida nasce a batida, canto pra ti
Até a raia e o esturjão virão cantar uma canção
Tudo a tocar, tudo a dançar aqui no mar
 A flauta sem pauta
A carpa com harpa
O baixo a compasso
Dá um som fantástico
Dão ais os metais
A tuba derruba
E este é o duque do Soul
A raiz faz, pois então, percussão
A truta é biruta
Mas canta rock
E mesmo o salmão
Vai na sua mão
E este aqui soprou
 Aqui no mar (Aqui no mar) Aqui no mar (Aqui no mar)
Se a sardinha vem toda em linha é pra dançar
Se eles têm areais, por cá há bandas originais
 As castanholas não são tão tolas, aqui no mar
E uma lesma trás outra lesma, aqui no mar
O caracol não usa cachecol
Há que ter ritmo, aqui é quente
Que confusão, mas que reinação
Sim, aqui no mar!
translated_poem:
Your place is here, not the human world...
The life here in the sea is much better than up there
 Wanting what is not ours... There's no way to be happy!
Don't wish to go up there, see, I'm saying it myself!
Look at the world around you here under the sea
So many things and so many colors, what else do you want?
 Here in the sea, here in the sea
It's better here, it's worse there I can swear
Beyond the sea life is bad
There is slavery
We float all the time here in the sea
 In the sea everyone is happy, our life is to play
In the land it's very different, we are only useful only to be fried
Sometimes in the fishbowl, there is not much to know
If I'm tasty on the other hand, it's me they're going to eat
 Oh no
Here in the sea, here in the sea
We are not fried, or cooked in fricassee
We are part of their list, they always send us the hook
I tell you, here there is no danger
 Here in the sea (Here in the sea) Here in the sea (Here in the sea)
From good life comes the beat, I sing for you
Even the manta ray and the sturgeon will come sing a song
Everything playing, everything dancing here in the sea
 The flute without pause
The carp with a harp
The bass in the compass
Makes a fantastic sound
The metals make ouch
The tuba knocks down
And this is the duke of Soul
The root then does percussion
The trout is crazy
But sings rock
And even the salmon
Goes in your hand
And this one blows
 Here in the sea (Here in the sea) Here in the sea (Here in the sea)
If the sardine comes in a line it's for dancing
If they have sand, here there are original bands
 The castanets are not that foolish, here in the sea
And a slug brings another slug, here in the sea
The snail doesn't wear a scarf
There gas to be rhythm, it's hot in here
What a confusion, but what fun
Yes, here in the sea!

Papou, comeu
Estou com medo
Você não me parece tão mal
Hahahahahaha
Engano, engano

Não pode ser, não pode ser

Por isso vamos dar um fim

 Primeiro então pra me aquecer
Vou me divertir
Deixá-lo tonto e indefeso
Seria melhor pra mim
Quem sabe uma dança
No embalo desse som
Mas nunca tente me enfrentar
Eu sou o Bicho Papão
 Uou, uou (Uau, uau)
Uou, uou (Uau, uau)
Uou, uou (Uau, uau)
Eu sou o Bicho Papão
 (Melhor me libertar

Eu sou terrível
O verdadeiro mal
Agora com sua licença
Vou acabar com o seu Natal
 (O que vai fazer?)

É música no ar
Eu jogo a sua vida

É bem mais divertido
Uma vida apostar
E a sua está na corda bamba

 (Você ainda está em tempo
De fazer uma boa ação)
 Que grande coragem
Você parece ter
Será que não entende, cara
que você vai morrer?
É inútil resistir
Eu sou o Bicho Papão
Sou um bicho bem malvado
E você está acabado
Ahahahahahaha
translated_poem:
Well, well, well, what we got here?
It gobbled, It ate
I'm scared
You don't look so evil
Hahahahahahah
A mistake, a mistake

It can't be, it can't be

You're fat, you're ugly
You don't have an evil face

To you and to Christmas
 First to warm me up
I'm gonna have some fun

I am the Boogie Man
 Uou, uou (Uau, uau)
Uou, uou (Uau, uau)
Uou, uou (Uau, uau)

 (You better set me free
Or you'll regret it
Everybody is waiting

 You're crazy, he's crazy

I can't believe it!
I'm terrible

Now If you excuse me

 (What will you do?)

 Wow, the sound of dice

 What big courage
You seem to have

original_poem:
Me disseram que eu voltei americanizada
Com burro de dinheiro
Que estou muito rica
Que não suporto mais o breque do pandeiro
E fico arrepiada ouvindo uma cuíca
 Disseram que com as mãos estou preocupada
E corre por aí
Que eu sei certo zum zum
Que já não tenho molho, ritmo, nem nada
E dos balangandans já nem existe mais nenhum
 Mas pra cima de mim, pra quê tanto veneno
Eu posso lá ficar americanizada
Eu que nasci com o samba e vivo no sereno
Topando a noite inteira a velha batucada
Nas rodas de malandro minhas preferidas
Eu digo mesmo eu te amo, e nunca "I love you"
Enquanto houver Brasil
Na hora das comidas
Eu sou do camarão ensopadinho com chuchu
translated_poem:
They said I came back Americanized
That I have a bunch a money
That I'm so rich
That I can't stand the sound of a tambourine
And that I get the shivers when I hear a cuíca
 They said I'm worried about my hands
And I know there's a rumour out there
That I don't have my spice, my rhythm, nothing
And that I have none of my big jewelry no more
 But come on, why people are so shady?
How would I get Americanized?
I, the one who was born with Samba and live the nightlife
Enjoying the the beating of the drums all night
In Rodas de Malandro, my favorite!
I say "eu te amo", never "I love you".
As long as there's Brazil
When it comes to food
I'm team shrimp stew with squash.

original_poem:
Foram tantos anos sem te encontrar
Quanto você mudou desde lá
Mudei demais também
Parece que foi uma vida atrás
A pausa da ampulheta em nós
 Mas o tempo não dissolve ligações antigas
Dentro, em meu coração
Já curaram as feridas
Outro dia eu acordei
De um sonho, coisa linda,
Rindo com você
 É tão bom te encontrar
Sempre gostoso te rever
Espero que esteja feliz
E só as coisas boas fiquem
 Mas o tempo não dissolve ligações antigas

translated_poem:
So many years passed without seeing you
You've changed so much since then
I've changed so much as well
Looks like it was in another life
The pause of the hourglass in us
 But time doesn't undo old knots
Inside, in my heart
The wounds have healed
The other day I woke up
From a dream, beautiful thing,
Laughing with you
 It feels so good to see you
It's always nice to see you again
I hope you're happy
And that only good things remain
 But time doesn't undo old knots
Inside, in my heart
The wounds have healed
The other day I woke up
From a dream, beautiful thing,
Laughing with you
 But time doesn't undo old knots
Inside, in my heart
The wounds have healed
The other day I woke up
From a dream, beautiful thing,
Laughing with you
 But time doesn't undo old knots
Inside, in my heart
The wounds have healed
The other day I woke up
From a dream, beautiful thing,
Laughing with you

original_poem:
O poeta é um fingidor
Finge tão completamente
Que chega a fingir que é dor
A dor que deveras sente.
 E os que lêem o que escreve,
Na dor lida sentem bem,
Não as duas que ele teve,
Mas só a que eles não têm.
 E assim nas calhas de roda
Gira, a entreter a razão,
Esse comboio de corda
Que se chama coração.
translated_poem:
The poet is a faker
Who’s so good at his act
He even fakes the pain
Of pain he feels in fact.
 And those who read his words
Will feel in his writing
Neither of the pains he has
But just the one they’re missing.
 And so around its track
This thing called the heart winds,
A little clockwork train
To entertain our minds.

Eu não vejo a hora
De um novo dia amanhecer

 Que eu te amo muito

translated_poem:
You went away (away)
I felt your absence
I can't wait
For the dawn of a new day
 To be able to see you again
To hug you with joy
I want to feel your body
And to be able to say to you...
 That I love you so much
And each minute
Further increases my desire
To hug you
And to kiss you
Each time, I'll give myself to you
 So say that you love me
When you arrive
Sit on my lap
Look in my eyes
And let the emotions guide us
 So say that you love me
When you find me
Say that you're my angel
And that this dream
Will never end
 I miss you
A new day dawns
To be able to find you again
To hug you with joy
I want to feel your body
And be able to say to you, to you..
 That I love you so much
And each minute
Further increases my desire
To hug you
And to kiss you
Each time, I'll give myself to you
 So say that you love me
When you arrive
Sit on my lap
Look in my eyes
And let the emotions guide us
 So say that you love me
When you find me
Say that you're my angel
And that this dream
Will never end

original_poem:
Te amar demais só me faz mal
Só me faz sofrer
Te quis tanto que nem quis viver pra mim
 Era como um sonho te querer
Pra te ver feliz
Desenhei o mundo que você mais quis
 Eu sofri demais, mas aprendi
Que o meu erro foi me dar demais assim
De nós dois, você foi quem perdeu
Vejo minha falta no seu mundo, eu sei
 Você vai voltar, vai me procurar
Pra viver um sonho
Vai querer ficar pra aprender do amor
Ser feliz de novo
translated_poem:
Loving you so much just harmed me
Just made me suffer
Wanting you so much, yet you couldn't have cared less
 It was like a dream wanting you
To see you happy
I designed the world you wanted most
 I suffered a lot, but I learned
That my mistake was giving you too much
Of the two of us, you're the one who lost
You'll see how much you've lost without me, I know it
 You'll come back looking for me
To live that dream
You'll want to stay, to learn about love
To be happy again
